thread.title: MOVES- Neon Underwriting, Aviva Investors, Lazard Asset Management

title: MOVES- Neon Underwriting, Aviva Investors, Lazard Asset Management

organizations.name: lazard asset management  lazard asset management llc

text:
April 10, 2018 / 11:57 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago CORRECTED-MOVES- Neon Underwriting, Aviva Investors, Lazard Asset Management Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Corrects Neon Underwriting’s company descriptor to “specialist non-life insurer” from “life and health insurer”) 
April 10 (Reuters) - The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Tuesday. To inform us of other job changes, email moves@thomsonreuters.com. LAZARD ASSET MANAGEMENT 
Lazard Asset Management LLC named former D.E.Shaw & Co executive David Gibson as managing director. NEON UNDERWRITING LTD 
The London-based specialist non-life insurer appointed Jeremy Cooke as contingency underwriter. AVIVA INVESTORS 
The global asset management business of Aviva Plc, appointed Steven Blackie as head of global product strategy. (Compiled by Mrinalini Krothapalli)
